articles.author: Francesca Ebel, Robyn Dixon, Ellen Francis, Catherine Belton, Siobhán O'Grady
articles.title: Russia sees victory in summit as Trump adopts Putin approach to ending war - The Washington Post
articles.description: In President Donald Trump’s warm red-carpet greeting at the Alaska summit, Russians saw an opening to pull America away from its traditional allies in Europe.
articles.content: MOSCOW For Russia, the results of the Alaska summit between President Donald Trump and President Vladimir Putin marked a turning point in U.S.-Russian relations underlined by the United States subseq… [+62 chars]

articles.author: Kimberley Richards
articles.title: American Eagle's Crystal-Clear Defense Of Controversial Sydney Sweeney Ads Signals A Lot - HuffPost
articles.description: Experts say that American Eagle's response to the outrage over its campaign featuring the "Euphoria" actor tells us a lot about the current political climate.
articles.content: American Eagle has responded to the widespread backlash over its ads featuring actor Sydney Sweeney, but noticeably missing from the brands statement was an apology or any real acknowledgement of how… [+8774 chars]
